letters.description: Evaluate chakra imbalances through intuitive and diagnostic techniques (e.g., dowsing, muscle testing, questionnaires).
Identify root causes of energetic stagnation using client history, emotional mapping, and somatic awareness.
Facilitate client understanding of how beliefs, emotions, and experiences impact their chakra system.
Apply targeted healing modalities (e.g., sound, crystals, affirmations, breathwork) to clear and balance chakras.
Empower clients with practices for ongoing self-care and energetic maintenance to sustain chakra health.
